title: Episode 51: The Sword of Brumaire
description:
Napoleon makes a triumphant return to France, but finds the country no longer has any dire need of a military savior. Nonetheless, a plot was already underway in Paris that would soon culminate in Napoleon's seizure of power.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Sword of Brumaire
itunes:author: Everett Rummage
itunes:subtitle: Napoleon makes his triumphal return to France and joins a coup plot that will culminate in his rise to power.
